code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}}}%%
gantt
    title erlmcp Quality Gates - Build Pipeline (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm
    axisFormat %H:%M

    section Pre-Commit (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Code Formatting              :active, p1, 2026-01-31 00:00, 5m
    Linting (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)    :crit, p2, after p1, 10m
    Type Checking (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)     :crit, p3, after p2, 15m
    Security Scan (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)       :crit, p4, after p3, 10m

    section Compilation (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    rebar3 compile               :crit, comp1, 2026-01-31 00:40, 10m
    Xref Analysis                :comp2, after comp1, 5m

    section Unit Testing (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    EUnit Tests                  :crit, test1, after comp2, 20m
    Coverage Analysis (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)     :crit, test2, after test1, 5m

    section Integration Testing (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    CommonTest Suites            :crit, integ1, after test2, 30m
    Property-Based (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)      :integ2, after integ1, 15m

    section Performance (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Benchmarking (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)    :bench1, after integ2, 15m
    Regression Analysis (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)   :crit, bench2, after bench1, 5m

    section Compliance (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Compliance Report Generation :comp1, 2026-01-31 02:00, 10m
    Evidence Bundle Creation     :crit, comp2, after comp1, 10m
    Release Certification        :milestone, comp3, after comp2, 0m
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
